Usually this channel doesn't require you to be identified, it only does now because of recent spam problems.
You accidentily installed grub to your windows partition.
can I fix it without reinstalling windows

In the future, never install grub to a partition, always to the mbr. To restore the windows bootloader follow this guide: http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/bootinfoscript/index.php?title=Boot_Problems:Boot_Sector
